channel.title: 525 W00tSc4p3 help
channel.description: [b]i cant eat food on *W00tSc4p3* how i can make eating food on W00tSc4p3 plz help[/b]

item.title: 525 W00tSc4p3 help
item.dc:creator: @propaganda propaganda
item.description:
@propaganda wrote:

open src>com>rs2hd>packethandler>ItemInteract

delete everything
then paste this

[code]package com.rs2hd.packethandler;

import org.apache.mina.common.IoSession;

import com.rs2hd.event.CoordinateEvent;
import com.rs2hd.model.Equipment;
import com.rs2hd.model.Inventory;
import com.rs2hd.model.Item;
import com.rs2hd.model.ItemDefinition;
import com.rs2hd.model.Location;
import com.rs2hd.model.Player;
import com.rs2hd.model.World;
import com.rs2hd.net.Packet;

/**

  • All item related packets.

  • @author Luke132

  • @author Graham
    */
    public class ItemInteract implements PacketHandler {

    private static final int EQUIP = 70;
    private static final int UNEQUIP = 103;
    private static final int ITEM_ON_ITEM = 85;
    private static final int INVEN_CLICK = 242;
    private static final int ITEM_ON_OBJECT = 118;
    private static final int OPERATE = 191;
    private static final int DROP = 171;
    private static final int PICKUP = 114;

    @Override
    public void handlePacket(Player player, IoSession session, Packet packet) {
    switch(packet.getId()) {
    case EQUIP:
    handleEquipItem(player, packet);
    break;

     case UNEQUIP:
 	handleUnequipItem(player, packet);
 	break;
 	
 case ITEM_ON_ITEM:
 	handleItemOnItem(player, packet);
 	break;
 	
 case INVEN_CLICK:
 	handleInvenClickItem(player, packet);
 	break;
 	
 case ITEM_ON_OBJECT:
 	handleItemOnObject(player, packet);
 	break;
 	
 case OPERATE:
 	handleOperateItem(player, packet);
 	break;
 	
 case DROP:
 	handleDropItem(player, packet);
 	break;
 	
 case PICKUP:
 	handlePickupItem(player, packet);
 	break;
 }

    }

    private void handleEquipItem(Player player, Packet packet) {
    int interfaceId = packet.readInt();
    int index = packet.readLEShort();
    int itemId = packet.readLEShort();
    if(index < 0 || index >= Inventory.SIZE || interfaceId != 149) {
    return;
    }
    Item item = player.getInventory().getContainer().get(index);
    if(item == null) {
    return;
    }
    if(Equipment.isTwoHanded(item.getDefinition()) && player.getInventory().getFreeSlots() < 1 && player.getEquipment().get(5) != null) {
    player.getActionSender().sendMessage(“Not enough free space in your inventory.”);
    return;
    }
    if(item.getDefinition().getId() == itemId) {
    int targetSlot = Equipment.getItemType(itemId);
    if(targetSlot == -1) {
    return;
    }
    player.getInventory().deleteItem(item.getDefinition().getId(), item.getAmount());
    if(targetSlot == 3) {
    if(Equipment.isTwoHanded(ItemDefinition.forId(itemId)) && player.getEquipment().get(5) != null) {
    if(!player.getInventory().addItem(player.getEquipment().get(5).getDefinition().getId(), player.getEquipment().get(5).getAmount())) {
    player.getInventory().addItem(itemId, item.getAmount());
    return;
    }
    player.getEquipment().set(5, null);
    }
    } else if(targetSlot == 5) {
    if(Equipment.isTwoHanded(ItemDefinition.forId(itemId)) && player.getEquipment().get(3) != null) {
    if(!player.getInventory().addItem(player.getEquipment().get(3).getDefinition().getId(), player.getEquipment().get(3).getAmount())) {
    player.getInventory().addItem(itemId, item.getAmount());
    return;
    }
    player.getEquipment().set(3, null);
    }
    }
    if(player.getEquipment().get(targetSlot) != null && (itemId != player.getEquipment().get(targetSlot).getDefinition().getId() || !item.getDefinition().isStackable())) {
    player.getInventory().addItem(player.getEquipment().get(targetSlot).getDefinition().getId(), player.getEquipment().get(targetSlot).getAmount());
    player.getEquipment().set(targetSlot, null);
    }
    int oldAmt = 0;
    if(player.getEquipment().get(targetSlot) != null) {
    oldAmt = player.getEquipment().get(targetSlot).getAmount();
    }
    Item item2 = new Item(itemId, oldAmt+item.getAmount());
    player.getEquipment().set(targetSlot, item2);

     }

    }

    private void handleUnequipItem(Player player, Packet packet) {
    int itemId = packet.readLEShortA();
    int unused = packet.readLEShort();
    int interfaceId = packet.readLEShort();
    int slot = packet.readLEShortA();
    if(slot < 0 || itemId < 0) {
    return;
    }
    if(slot < Equipment.SIZE && player.getEquipment().get(slot) != null && interfaceId == 387) {
    if(!player.getInventory().addItem(player.getEquipment().get(slot).getDefinition().getId(), player.getEquipment().get(slot).getAmount())) {
    return;
    }
    player.getEquipment().set(slot, null);
    }
    }

    private void handleItemOnItem(Player player, Packet packet) {
    int unused = packet.readInt();
    int unused1 = packet.readInt();
    int itemOne = packet.readShortA();
    int itemTwo = packet.readShort();
    int slotOne = packet.readLEShort();
    int slotTwo = packet.readLEShortA();

    }

    private void handleInvenClickItem(Player player, Packet packet) {
    int slot = packet.readLEShortA();
    int itemId = packet.readLEShortA();
    int unused = packet.readLEShort();
    int interfaceId = packet.readLEShort();
    if(player == null) {
    return;
    }
    if(player.eatDelay > 0) {
    return;
    }
    switch(itemId) {
    case 391:
    player.getSkills().addHp(22);
    player.sm(“You eat the Manta Ray.”);
    player.eatDelay = 2;
    player.getInventory().deleteItem(itemId, 1);
    player.animate(829, 0);
    break;
    case 379:
    player.getSkills().addHp(12);
    player.sm(“You eat the Lobster.”);
    player.eatDelay = 2;
    player.getInventory().deleteItem(itemId, 1);
    player.animate(829, 0);
    break;
    case 373:
    player.getSkills().addHp(14);
    player.sm(“You eat the Swordfish.”);
    player.eatDelay = 2;
    player.getInventory().deleteItem(itemId, 1);
    player.animate(829, 0);
    break;
    case 385:
    player.getSkills().addHp(20);
    player.sm(“You eat the Shark.”);
    player.eatDelay = 2;
    player.getInventory().deleteItem(itemId, 1);
    player.animate(829, 0);
    break;
    case 7946:
    player.getSkills().addHp(18);
    player.sm(“You eat the Monkfish.”);
    player.eatDelay = 2;
    player.getInventory().deleteItem(itemId, 1);
    player.animate(829, 0);
    break;
    case 395:
    player.getSkills().addHp(20);
    player.sm(“You eat the Sea Turtle.”);
    player.eatDelay = 2;
    player.getInventory().deleteItem(itemId, slot);
    player.animate(829, 0);
    break;
    case 361:
    player.getSkills().addHp(10);
    player.sm(“You eat the Tuna.”);
    player.eatDelay = 2;
    player.getInventory().deleteItem(itemId, 1);
    player.animate(829, 0);
    break;

     	default: player.sm("Unknown item Id: "+itemId); 
 }

    }

    private void handleItemOnObject(Player player, Packet packet) {
    int interfaceId = packet.readInt();
    int objectId = packet.readLEShort();
    int objectX = packet.readShortA();
    int itemId = packet.readShortA();
    int objectY = packet.readShort();
    int itemSlot = packet.readLEShortA();

    }

    private void handleOperateItem(Player player, Packet packet) {
    int itemId = packet.readShort();
    int itemSlot = packet.readLEShortA();
    int unused = packet.readInt();

    }

    private void handleDropItem(Player player, Packet packet) {
    int unused = packet.readInt();
    int slot = packet.readLEShortA();
    int itemId = packet.readLEShort();
    if(slot < 0 || slot >= Inventory.SIZE || player.getInventory().getContainer().get(slot) == null) {
    return;
    }
    Item item = player.getInventory().getContainer().get(slot);
    player.getInventory().getContainer().set(slot, null);
    player.getInventory().refresh();
    World.getInstance().getItemManager().createGroundItem(player, item);
    }

    private void handlePickupItem(final Player player, Packet packet) {
    int y = packet.readShort();
    final int id = packet.readLEShort();
    int x = packet.readLEShort();
    final Location l = Location.location(x, y, player.getLocation().getZ());
    World.getInstance().registerCoordinateEvent(new CoordinateEvent(player, l) {
    @Override
    public void run() {
    if(player.getLocation().withinInteractionDistance(l)) {
    if(World.getInstance().getItemManager().groundItemExists(l, id)) {
    int itemAmount = World.getInstance().getItemManager().getItemAmount(l, id);
    assert itemAmount != -1;
    if(player.getInventory().hasRoomFor(id, itemAmount)) {
    World.getInstance().getItemManager().destroyGroundItem(l, id);
    player.getInventory().addItem(id, itemAmount);
    }
    }
    }
    }
    });
    }

}
[/code]

credits to guy above me for giving me idea of where to insert the eating interaction
and to me for supplying this code

Read full topic

item.title: 525 W00tSc4p3 help
item.dc:creator: @superwiz789 superwiz789
item.description:
@superwiz789 wrote:

alright , go to src/com/rs2hd/packethandler then open iteminteract. search for private void handleInvenClickItem(Player player, Packet packet) { under that
return; put this - [code] }
if(player.eatDelay > 0) {
return;
}
switch(itemId) {

	case 391:
		player.getSkills().addHp(22);
		player.sm("You eat the Manta Ray.");
		player.eatDelay += 4;
		player.combatDelay += 4;
		player.getInventory().deleteItem(itemId, 1);
		player.animate(829, 0);
	break;
		
	case 1961:
		player.getSkills().addHp(1);
		player.sm("You eat the Easter Egg.");
		player.eatDelay += 4;
		player.combatDelay += 4;
		player.getInventory().deleteItem(itemId, 1);
		player.animate(829, 0);
	break;

	case 2440:
	if (player.getSkills().getLevel(2) == 99) {
		player.getSkills().setLvl(2, 119);
		player.getSkills().refreshLvls();
		player.getInventory().deleteItem(itemId, 1);
		player.animate(829, 0);
	}
		player.eatDelay += 4;
		player.combatDelay += 4;
	break;
		
	case 379:
		player.getSkills().addHp(12);
		player.sm("You eat the Lobster.");
		player.eatDelay += 4;
		player.combatDelay += 4;
		player.getInventory().deleteItem(itemId, 1);
		player.animate(829, 0);
	break;
		
	case 373:
		player.getSkills().addHp(14);
		player.sm("You eat the Swordfish.");
		player.eatDelay += 4;
		player.combatDelay += 4;
		player.getInventory().deleteItem(itemId, 1);
		player.animate(829, 0);
	break;
	
	case 385:
		player.getSkills().addHp(20);
		player.sm("You eat the Shark.");
		player.eatDelay += 4;
		player.combatDelay += 4;
		player.getInventory().deleteItem(itemId, 1);
		player.animate(829, 0);
	break;
	
	case 7946:
		player.getSkills().addHp(18);
		player.sm("You eat the Monkfish.");
		player.eatDelay += 4;
		player.combatDelay += 4;
		player.getInventory().deleteItem(itemId, 1);
		player.animate(829, 0);
	break;
	
	case 395:
		player.getSkills().addHp(20);
		player.sm("You eat the Sea Turtle.");
		player.eatDelay += 4;
		player.combatDelay += 4;
		player.getInventory().deleteItem(itemId, slot);
		player.animate(829, 0);
	break;
		
	case 361:
		player.getSkills().addHp(10);
		player.sm("You eat the Tuna.");
		player.eatDelay += 4;
		player.combatDelay += 4;
		player.getInventory().deleteItem(itemId, 1);
		player.animate(829, 0);
	break;
		
		default: player.sm("Unknown item Id: "+itemId); 
	}
}[/code]
